channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description:
Ok, my 2 Questions areeeee
How do i make that Admins Can't trade? That it says: This player cannot trade. or Administrator cannot trade.
My second question: How do i make that Players cannot Attack Administrator in Wildy. That it says: You cannot attack this Player. Or You cannon attack a Administrator in Wildy.
Thanks if u helped me. ~Moerin

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @moerin moerin
item.description:
@moerin wrote:

[quote=“omg ffs ownd, post:2, topic:177135”]1. Go to Client.java
make it so admins can’t trade
send the message saying so
2. go into Client.java
make it so players cannot attack admins
send the message saying so

thats for flaming my thread asshole

hope you don’t get helped because you were a complete douchebag for out of the blue spamming my thread.[/quote]
What u talking about, this is calling spamming MY thread, and one thing, i maded this topic so why are you talking??

Read full topic
